summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the behavior of various TagStudio macros, including duplicate entry refresh, folder‑to‑tag conversion, missing‑file handling, directory refresh tracking, and sidecar processing, ensuring that internal registries stay consistent with the library state.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of macro-driven operations in the TagStudio platform, supporting automated quality assurance and preventing data inconsistencies during file management tasks.
